-1.title: 2016 Special
-1.plot: We really missed you all this year, but we're going to try and work on the ADVENTure way earlier next year to fit our life schedules.

1.title: Eggs Or Ham? (Day 1)
1.plot: Welcome to this year's Christmas series - a Christmas ADVENTure made and played with Lewis and Henry from Noxcrew / Smappz.

2.title: Rubbish With Riddles.. (Day 2)
2.plot: In today's episode the gang are given something that Martyn absolutely rubbish at - a riddle. It leads them to an area that few in Minecraftia dare tread.

3.title: Noooooo!!! (Day 3)
3.plot: Martyn, Toby, Lewis and Henry continue their Christmas ADVENTure.

4.title: Hot Tub Pain Machine! (Day 4)
4.plot: In today's episode the gang make the first extension to Aunty Sandy's lodge (other than Toby's horrid train in the living room) and laugh a lot.

5.title: Race From Grinch Mountain (Day 5)
5.plot: In today's episode the Grinch has been up to no good again - stealing some of the gang's most treasured items in the lodge and scattering them around.

6.title: It's A Bit Coal! (Day 6)
6.plot: Martyn was too busy streaming to add a description on this one.

7.title: Kissing Under Moonlight (Day 7)
7.plot: In today's episode the gang wake up to found 2 of our companions have gone missing. They also make first contact with a very jolly fellow.

8.title: Marvin & Hank (Day 8)
8.plot: Martyn finally fixed the audio issues, so the gang are back to uploading.

9.title: Snowball Fight Tournament! (Day 9)
9.plot: In today's ADVENTure the gang's jolly selves stay up overnight to complete the next challenge and end up playing games instead. Also, they don't know recipes.

10.title: Stefanisa Scrooge (Day 10)
10.plot: Martyn was too busy streaming with Strippin' to bother writing a description for this one.

11.title: 12 Gold Baaaars!! (Day 11/12)
11.plot: Martyn was busy seeing The Hobbit yesterday, so there was no episode and now the gang have to do two advent doors to catch up.

12.title: Saplings & Two Face (Day 13)
12.plot: In today's episode the jolly adventurers are given the task of finding the Christmas tree some familiar company.

13.title: Two Face LIVES!! (Day 14/15)
13.plot: Today our festive heroes venture to the north-most northern point of the world to the beacon of Christmas itself and leave their mark for others.

14.title: You Just Got Served!! (Day 16)
14.plot: Today's adventure begins with a short lived dance battle between XiLubez (Lewis) and Hank the guard golem, followed by the usual fun.

15.title: That Is A Profit (Day 17)
15.plot: In today's episode the jolly adventurers continue to develop their new shack into a loving and warm home, with many ideas being thrown around. Which ones will stick?

16.title: Toby Finally Died? (Day 18)
16.plot: In today's video the jolly adventurers wake up to a wonderful treat from their new friends, the elves.

17.title: Milk And Cookies (Day 19)
17.plot: In today's episode the festive four have direct and personal orders from the big man himself. A spot of space jumping is good too.

18.title: A Great Loss.. (Day 20)
18.plot: Martyn almost lost today's episode entirely, but with the glitchy video left over he was able to rescue a somewhat coherent episode.

19.title: Pugs Not Drugs! (Day 21/22)
19.plot: In today's episode the festive four head to the top of the calendar (not just the floor, the roof) to help out an unexpected guest.

20.title: Guinness World Buddy (Day 23)
20.plot: In today's episode the festive four have a "tiny" mission to assist in with a new friend. Can they seal away that which hates Christmas?

21.title: Aunt Sandy's Surprise! (Finale)
21.plot: Today the adventurers conclude the story by flipping the switch under Aunty Sandy's tree and find out what treat she had in store for them.

0.title: 2013 Trailer
0.plot: A little teaser for the upcoming sequel to 2012's Minecraft Christmas Adventure.

1.title: Bathroom Privacy - Day 1
1.plot: It's the holiday season once more and our 4 heroes are still clowning around in the snow with their sticks and wool hats.

2.title: Jump For Ice Cream! - Day 2
2.plot: The ADVENTure continues today with our four heroes being treated to a consolation prize for the Spleef tournament - ice cream.

3.title: The Four Globes - Day 3
3.plot: Today things get competitive again between our four Christmas adventurers with globes and blocks to find in a race for the chest,

4.title: The Muffin Man - Day 4
4.plot: Today our Christmas adventurers put down their swords and pick up their frying pans like Flynn Rider and get cooking.

5.title: Tiny Jumpers - Day 5
5.plot: Today our heroes wake up ready for another day of festive fun but it seems something has gone awry and their plans change.

6.title: Friendship Bridge - Day 6
6.plot: In today's episode our adventurers are thrown atop an avalanche and search the snow for any signs of life. Will they find anybody?

7.title: Stable Mates - Day 7
7.plot: Today our brave ADVENTurers are given the task of building homes for future members of the team.

8.title: Saddle Up! - Day 8
8.plot: Today our ADVENTurers head out into the wild to try and tame some sturdy steeds to parade around on and feed hay to. Will they find any?

9.title: Mr Rodriquez - Day 9
9.plot: Today our ADVENTurers are given a very important task that will change Aunty Sandy and Uncle Stefano's neighbors opinions of them - for better or maybe worse. Will they screw it up?

10.title: Floppy Tinsel - Day 10
10.plot: Today our ADVENTurers are given the task of giving each other gifts - but they aren't allowed to know who they came from.

11.title: Potion Of Diarrhea - Day 11
11.plot: Today our ADVENTurers wake up to discover that all their presents have been stolen. Maybe they will finally face the one trying to ruin their Christmas?

12.title: Ressurection & Invitation - Day 12
12.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers realize that they forgot about two of the most beloved members of the team from last year and Uncle Stefano decides it's best to bring them back.

13.title: Hank's Poem - Day 13
13.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers are given a competitive challenge but decide to throw that aside (sorry Stefano) and collaborate on a giant project.

14.title: The Heist - Day 14
14.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers wake up to listen to a rather worrying voicemail from Uncle Stefano and Aunty Sandy. Their safety rests in our heroes' hands - can they save them?

15.title: PlatFOURmers - Day 15
15.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers follow in the foot steps of gaming's greats like Mario, Crash Bandicoot and more to do a spot of platforming.

16.title: Pub Quiz - Day 16
16.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers are given the day off and get to relax in the pub and have a few brew-skis. Oh, and there are Minecraft quiz questions too.

17.title: Chimney Problems - Day 17
17.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers have to help a familiar friend get out of a situation that you think he'd be well versed in by now.

18.title: Concert For Bats - Day 18
18.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers help another festive friend in need. Unfortunately, this one is of the more musical taste and they're all tone deaf.

19.title: Cheeky Monkey - Day 19
19.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers are met with a challenge that's made even more difficult because of a certain (blue) monkey flinging poo.

20.title: Another Pint! - Day 20
20.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers are sent on another trip to the pub for a second shot at the quiz with some pretty "interesting" prizes up for grabs.

21.title: Bog Off! - Day 21
21.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers go head to head in another competition and this time, it's every man for himself. No pairs here (other than wings and thighs).

22.title: Xmas Warriors - Day 22
22.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers go head to head in another competition and this time, it's every man for himself. No pairs here (other than wings and thighs).

23.title: Ice Crystal - Day 23
23.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers are short a member shortly after waking up. Where did one of them go? Can they get him back?

24.title: Neck And Neck - Day 24
24.plot: In today's episode our ADVENTurers have to help out an old friend, but it requires them to go head to head in a race for Christmas. Who will win?

25.title: Christmas Day 2013
25.plot: A tiny gift from us to you, believe your eyes, it's really true. Now you can be at center, of your very own Christmas Adventure.

0.title: Teaser
0.plot: A Christmas ADVENTure is returning for a third year. All aboard the hype train.

1.title: Welcome To Tinsel Town (Day 1)
1.plot: Welcome to the third (and potentially final) Minecraft Christmas ADVENTure. This year, as always, the boys are in a brand new location to squat in another Sandy and Stefano mansion.

2.title: Toblerones Make Triforce (Day 2)
2.plot: Today the ADVENTurers get to meet the head honcho, the Mayor of Tinsel Town who is having a little trouble with a particularly ugly Christmas tree on the outskirts of town.

3.title: The Booty!! (Day 3)
3.plot: Today our ADVENTurers get to know the townsfolk of Tinsel Town who let them know about some of the best places to visit. Upon one villager's advice they head to the frozen lake.

4.title: Two Old Friends (Day 4)
4.plot: Today our ADVENTurers are up bright and early because it's a very special day. Two old friends have come from out of town to visit but seem to have gotten a little lost along the way.

5.title: Come Build With Me (Day 5)
5.plot: Today the ADVENTurers are woken up with the freshly risen sun and the bells ringing in the town square as the Mayor declares an annual competition is upon them.

6.title: Silent Night (Day 6)
6.plot: Today the ADVENTurers have a not so pleasant alarm clock in the form of out-of-tune bells ringing loudly throughout Tinsel Town. Who could have done this?

7.title: Our Jumpy Past (Day 7)
7.plot: Today the ADVENTurers are somehow transported back in time (unfortunately not by a Tardis) to a day of Christmas past and of course that comes complete with the full package of a ghost to boot.

8.title: Chicken Mafia (Day 8)
8.plot: Today the ADVENTurers get to fight it out in the greatest seasonal multi-layer extravaganza to ever hit the Spleefing world. What happens at the end of Round 1 is near impossible.

9.title: Green Man Clash (Day 9)
9.plot: Today the ADVENTurers wake up to find a gaping hole at the foot of the stairs in Scrooge's mansion - but what the is it and how did it get there?

10.title: What The Fork (Day 10)
10.plot: Today the ADVENTurers get in to their first ever argument and there's only one way for them to settle it in Tinsel Town - with an almighty snowball war.

11.title: Whack A Painting! (Day 11)
11.plot: Today the ADVENTurers get to meet a local legend who creates some of the greatest games to ever grace people's living rooms. He is a little bit nuts though.

12.title: The Urine Beacon (Day 12)
12.plot: Today the ADVENTurers have a guest knocking on their front door who's clearly in distress because his two masters have gone and gotten themselves stuck.

13.title: Spooky O'Clock (Day 13)
13.plot: Today the ADVENTurers and Stefano are all on edge because it's the unlucky thirteenth day of the month. Thank goodness it's not a Friday too. That doesn't stop weird things from happening, though.

14.title: Frosty Landlord (Day 14)
14.plot: Today the ADVENTurers are visited by yet another ghost of Christmas past, but this one doesn't complain about just how much it costs to travel nowadays. He is grumpier, though.

15.title: Revenge (Day 15)
15.plot: The fifteenth day in Tinsel Town is the quietest one of the month as always with the townsfolk deep in their duties in preparation for the big day, so our ADVENTurers wander over to the pub.

16.title: Starblocks Coffee (Day 16)
16.plot: Tomorrow the ADVENTurers have a friend coming to see them in Tinsel Town so they have to get some plans together to show them a good time. Time to visit the market.

17.title: Kill Bill (Day 17)
17.plot: This morning the ADVENTurers wake up incredibly late and it nearly ruins all the plans they worked so hard on yesterday. Luckily, the feast can continue as planned. Now, who can cook?

18.title: We're All A Little Mad! (Day 18)
18.plot: This morning the ADVENTurers wake up incredibly late and it nearly ruins all the plans they worked so hard on yesterday. Luckily, the feast can continue as planned. Now, who can cook?

19.title: Manic Market (Day 19)
19.plot: It's the busiest day the ADVENTurers have seen in Tinsel Town since they arrived in the most festive place on earth. There are market stalls selling food, DVDs and - other things.

20.title: Santa's Helper (Day 20)
20.plot: Today is the coldest day the ADVENTurers have seen in Tinsel Town - so cold that a knock on their (invisible) front door was quite the surprise. Even more so with it being a very famous YouTuber.

21.title: Around The Bend (Day 21)
21.plot: Today the ADVENTurers complete the hat shaped Triforce as they're made aware of a great danger that lies before Aunty Sandy and Uncle Stefano. Can they save the day in time?

22.title: Furnace Frenzy! (Day 22)
22.plot: Today the ADVENTurers start to feel the chill of Tinsel Town creep in to their home and wonder why their breakfast has gotten so cold. They set off in to the frost to find a solution.

23.title: Pesky Postman (Day 23)
23.plot: Today the ADVENTurers hear screaming and bellowing from all the way across town. Who is in need of some rescuing? What beast guards their path?

24.title: Stop That Train!! (Day 24)
24.plot: It's time to rock down to the final home on Adventure Avenu. It's a sad but also triumphant day for our ADVENTurers. What could possibly go wrong?

25.title: The End (Day 25)
25.plot: It's time to rock down to the final home on Adventure Avenue. It's a sad but also triumphant day for our ADVENTurers. What could possibly go wrong?

26.title: Map Download!
26.plot: This was filmed back in December, sorry for the delay.

0.title: 2015 Announcement!
0.plot: If you want your build featured in the ADVENTure this year then create a flatland world save and work in a 13x13x13 space the upload it to PlanetMinecraft with the tag Advent2015.

1.title: New York City (Day 1)
1.plot: This year our ADVENTurers spend the holiday season in the Big Apple. Will they ever see MegaGWolf? Did he catch his flight?

2.title: Festive Floats (Day 2)
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Bob Ross Paintings (Day 3)
3.plot: Today our ADVENTurers meet another colorful character who needs help in Times Square too. Who's ready to paint some happy little everything's?

4.title: For Four Years (Day 4)
4.plot: Today our ADVENTurers finally visit a place they've just missed out on every year for nearly half a decade. Martyn screams.

5.title: King Of The Hill (Day 5)
5.plot: Today our ADVENTurers are re-united with an old festive friend from a land far, far away - they assume. To battle.

6.title: Meeting The Inlaws (Day 6)
6.plot: Write down your answers and play along, then comment below what score you got out of 5.

7.title: Trading Up! (Day 7)
7.plot: Today our ADVENTurers have a tiny knock on the door from an unexpected visitor who needs their help.

8.title: Jazz Off! (Day 8)
8.plot: Today our ADVENTurers learn about some new talents that their very good friends have. Smooth.

9.title: Rockefeller Sprinter (Day 9)
9.plot: Martyn didn't bother to write a description for this one.

10.title: Home Alone (Day 10)
10.plot: Today our ADVENTurers hear a few creepy voices by the windows and decide to fortify to the apartment against potential foes.

11.title: Let It Go (Day 11)
11.plot: Today our ADVENTurers face off against each other in a creative competition. All the Bob Ross love is out the window.

12.title: Out Of Nowhere (Day 12)
12.plot: Today our ADVENTurers do something surprising.

13.title: Plain Sailing (Day 13)
13.plot: Today our ADVENTurers try out one of the new features from the snapshot and test their dexterity on the open seas - well, lakes.

14.title: Another Favour (Day 14)
14.plot: Today our ADVENTurers are tasked with saving Christmas and solving one of the many problems when prepping for the big night.

15.title: Contemporary Art (Day 15)
15.plot: Today our ADVENTurers realize that one crucial part of the description is missing because Martyn messed up while pasting it in.

16.title: ExciteCart (Day 16)
16.plot: Today our ADVENTurers get another knock-off game.

17.title: In Spaaaaaace (Day 17)
17.plot: Today our ADVENTurers celebrate the release of Star Wars Episode VII in space.

18.title: Barista Time! (Day 18)
18.plot: Sorry about the delay with this one. Martyn is pretty sick at the moment, but he's doing my best. Day 19 will be out today too.

19.title: Tag You're It (Day 19)
19.plot: Today our ADVENTurers are feeling a little mischievous so a childish game of tag ensues - but with a frosty twist.

20.title: Miles Per Hour (Day 20)
20.plot: Today our ADVENTurers help a two tailed acquaintance collect stray rings for a certain blue friend of his.

21.title: Rescue Repairs (Day 21)
21.plot: Today our ADVENTurers are greeted (quite somberly) by a tiny friend of theirs in need of some help again to save Christmas.

22.title: Where It Started (Day 22)
22.plot: Today our ADVENTurers see the real intentions behind some of our most frequent faces this year.

23.title: Mafia Wars (Day 23)
23.plot: Today our ADVENTurers wake up after what was quite the traumatic and flustered 22nd day in New York City.

25.title: Calendar Complete (Day 25)
25.plot: Thank you for joining us on another magical ADVENTure to save Christmas and spread some cheer. Maybe we'll see you all - next year.

26.title: Best Bits Movie!
26.plot: Martyn started chopping up highlights to pop in to the calendar episode, but he quickly realized there were A LOT of really funny moments this year. So he made a big old montage instead.

imdb.plot outline: Martyn, Toby, Lewis and Henry all spend the month of December away from the busy cities at their aunt's secluded lodge. They soon discover they are right next to a giant Advent Calendar full of various adventures, but all too often a green man causes mischief.
imdb.title: A Christmas ADVENTure
plot: Martyn, Toby, Lewis and Henry all spend the month of December away from the busy cities at their aunt's secluded lodge. They soon discover they are right next to a giant Advent Calendar full of various adventures, but all too often a green man causes mischief.
